ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: bombarding them with stones of hard-baked clay,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: (While) you were pelting them with stones of porphyritic lava,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: which smote them with stones of baked clay,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: which showered them with small pebbles of clay
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Which hit them with stones of baked clay,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Striking them with stones of Sijjil.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Casting against them stones of baked clay,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: hurling against them stones of baked clay
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Which pelted them with stones of baked clay,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: which pelted them with clay stones?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They hurled upon them stones of baked clay;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: pelting them with stones of shale,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Striking them with stones of baked clay.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Striking them with stones of Sijjil.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: pelting them with stones of baked clay,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Throwing at them rocks of baked clay.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Striking them with stones of hard clay,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [105:4] pelting them with stones of baked clay,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Which pelted them with) which threw on them (stones of baked clay) like baked bricks.
